downloadTitle: Microsoft OLE DB Provider for DB2 Version 7.0
downloadDescription: Microsoft OLE DB Provider for DB2 Version 7.0
detailsSection: Microsoft OLE DB Provider for DB2 works with Microsoft SQL Server to connect SQL applications and tools to IBM DB2 databases.
systemRequirementsSection:
This release supports the following operating systems:
  • Windows 10
  • Windows Server 2022
  • Windows Server 2019
  • Virtualization with Azure and Hyper-V
This release requires the following Microsoft .NET Framework:
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8
This release requires the following Microsoft Visual C++ runtime libraries:
  • Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2019 runtime libraries for x86 and x64
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
